001package imagingbook.calibration.zhang.testdata;
002
003import java.awt.geom.Point2D;
004import java.nio.file.Path;
005
006import org.apache.commons.math3.linear.MatrixUtils;
007
008import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
009import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.ViewTransform;
010import imagingbook.lib.util.ResourceUtils;
011
012
013/**
014 * Supplies all data for Zhang's demo calibration test suite.
015 * @author WB
016 *
017 */
018public class ZhangData {
019        
020        public static final int ImageWidth = 640;
021        public static final int ImageHeight = 480;
022        public static final int NumberOfViews = ZhangObservedPoints.pointData.length;
023        
024        public static Point2D[] getModelPoints() {
025                return ZhangStandardModel.getPoints();
026        }
027        
028        public static Point2D[] getObservedPoints(int viewNr) {
029                return ZhangObservedPoints.getPoints(viewNr);
030        }
031        
032        public static Point2D[][] getAllObservedPoints() {
033                Point2D obsPoints[][] = new Point2D[NumberOfViews][];
034                for (int i = 0; i < NumberOfViews; i++) {
035                        int viewNr = i + 1;
036                        obsPoints[i] = ZhangData.getObservedPoints(viewNr);
037                }
038                return obsPoints;
039        }
040        
041        public static ViewTransform[] getAllViewTransforms() {
042                ViewTransform[] viewtransforms = new ViewTransform[NumberOfViews];
043                for (int i = 0; i < NumberOfViews; i++) {
044                        viewtransforms[i] = getViewTransform(i);
045                }
046//              return new ViewTransform[] 
047//                      {getViewTransform(1), getViewTransform(2), getViewTransform(3), getViewTransform(4), getViewTransform(5)};
048                return viewtransforms;
049        }
050        
051        public static ViewTransform getViewTransform(int viewNr) {
052                double[][] RT = ZhangCameraViews.getViewMatrix(viewNr);
053                return (RT == null) ? null : new ViewTransform(MatrixUtils.createRealMatrix(RT));
054        }
055        
056        public static Camera getCameraIntrinsics() {
057                // http://research.microsoft.com/en-us/um/people/zhang/calib/Calibration/Calib.txt
058                return new Camera (
059                                832.5,   832.53, 0.204494,      // alpha, beta, gamma, (!)
060                                303.959, 206.585,                       // c_x, c_y
061                                -0.228601, 0.190353);           // k1, k2
062        }
063                
064        public static int extractViewNumber(String imgShortTitle) {
065//              String imgShortTitle = im.getShortTitle();
066                String numba = imgShortTitle.substring(imgShortTitle.length() - 1, imgShortTitle.length());
067                return Integer.decode(numba) - 1;
068        }
069        
070        /**
071         * Returns the path to the test image for the given view number
072         * @param vn view number (0,...,4)
073         * @return the path to the test image for the given view number
074         */
075        public static Path getViewImagePath(int vn) {
076                String imgName = "CalibIm" + (vn + 1) + ".gif";
077                return getResourcePath(imgName);
078        }
079        
080        private static final String resourceDir = "resources/";
081        
082        public static Path getResourcePath(String name) {
083                return ResourceUtils.getResourcePath(ZhangData.class, resourceDir + name);
084        }
085        
086        // -----------------------------------------------------
087        
088//      public static void main(String[] args) {
089//              System.out.println("testing access to resources:");
090//              String path = "resources/testFile1.txt";
091//              URL location = ZhangData.class.getResource(path);
092//              
093//              if (location == null) {
094//                      System.out.println("Resource not found: " + path);
095//              }
096//              else {
097//                      System.out.println("Class found: " + location.toString());
098//              }
099//      }
100        
101
102}
